title: BitcoinBalance
author: BitcoinBalance
content: CleanSenior: $300 BTC Full: $150 BTC NegHero: $150 BTC Senior: $100 BTCFull: $50 BTC___________________NO NEGOTIATION___________________Accounts are real. Can't show ids for obvious reasons. You will get pass. You can change it immediately. I'm not interested in scams.

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinBalance on July 17, 2022, 05:19:26 PMI'm not interested in scams.You may not be interested in scam but the owner of the hacked account won't forget to lock the account once they see the password has been changed. Owner will of course lock the account.Stop trading accounts. It encourages scam and of course spam.

comments.author: BitcoinBalance
comments.body: Bump(not a scam accounts are legit pm and i will prove)
